name: Porter in the Castle
description:
Feel like a porter in a medieval castle.

The game is a 2D platformer with unusual mechanics of delivering things to the place. You cannot kill anyone in the game. It's more about exploration and fun. We pick up things and carry them to their places.

Due to the fact that things have different shapes and sizes, you will have to puzzle over how to deliver this or that thing to the place on time.

Different things fall out of the window of the house, you need to pick them up and carry them to the castle, placing them in places marked in green. If you do not have time to quickly bring the thing to the place, it will disappear and you will have to carry it again.

For each thing delivered, you receive a reward.

As soon as all the things are placed, you will win the game and get speed points on the leaderboard.

You can control the player on the keyboard buttons and pick up, throw items on the left mouse button.
